Mom_D1: Good morning sweetheart. Did you sleep well?
Mom_D2: Before you go to school, there is an apple for breakfast in the kitchen.
Mom_D3: Is something wrong, sweetheart? You need to get ready to go to school.
Mom_D4: Strange noises in my bedroom? You must still be sleepy.
Stranger_D1: Hey buddy! Can you give me a hand? I'm tied to your mom's bed and can't get free. If you could just... untie me... there...
Stranger_D2: Thanks a lot! Just so you know, I saw your brother with a key yesterday.
Stranger_D3: Maybe that's what you are looking for.
Stranger_D4: In this room must be the copy key of your brother's bedroom.
Stranger_D6: I'll wait here until your mother leaves the living room so I can escape through the window.
